testimonial.desc: We recently purchased a Steinel Heat Gun on-line with PayPal. We just wanted to say “thank you” for the prompt service, competitive pricing and gift of lollies on our first purchase! I have distributed the catalogues supplied to various staff members in the interests of future business.
